snippet: Terrorism fatalities in the most dangerous countries in the world are falling. But deaths in North America and Western Europe, still rare, are up....
abstract: The Upshot; analysts who monitor terror attacks report that death toll from terrorism has risen in West, while deaths from terrorism in world's most dangerous countries have decreased.
lead_paragraph: Terrorism fatalities in the most dangerous countries in the world are falling. But deaths in North America and Western Europe, still rare, are up.

headline.print_headline: Is Terrorism Getting Worse? In West, Yes. In World, No.
headline.main: Is Terrorism Getting Worse? In the West, Yes. In the World, No.
